content: **knitted trousers for baby in drops fabel the piece is worked in rib sizes 0 - 4 years ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern fa-040-by yarn group a ----------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** 0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2- 3/4 years size in cm 48/52 - 56/62 - 68/74 - 80/86 92-104 cm note due to the rib the piece is elastic and will contract in relation to the measurements in the sketch **yarn** drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100-100-100-100 100-150 g colour 921 unicorn party **needles** drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 24 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
